content:
Craft an item of type: prismarine
inventory=[{"type": "birch_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 44, "index": 11}, {"type": "spawner", "quantity": 22, "index": 15}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "bucket", "quantity": 16, "index": 17}, {"type": "gray_concrete", "quantity": 62, "index": 29}, {"type": "stonecutter", "quantity": 52, "index": 31}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 4, "index": 38}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft prismarine, I need to place 4 prismarine_shards in the crafting grid in the shape of a 2x2 square. Therefore I will move one prismarine_shard from slot 38 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: prismarine
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 44, "index": 11}, {"type": "spawner", "quantity": 22, "index": 15}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "bucket", "quantity": 16, "index": 17}, {"type": "gray_concrete", "quantity": 62, "index": 29}, {"type": "stonecutter", "quantity": 52, "index": 31}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 3, "index": 38}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I need to place another prismarine_shard to the right of the first one, so I will move one from slot 38 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 2 with quantity 1

thought: Now I need to place another prismarine_shard below the first one, so I will move one from slot 38 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: prismarine
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "birch_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 44, "index": 11}, {"type": "spawner", "quantity": 22, "index": 15}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "bucket", "quantity": 16, "index": 17}, {"type": "gray_concrete", "quantity": 62, "index": 29}, {"type": "stonecutter", "quantity": 52, "index": 31}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I can craft the prismarine by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
